GSD.description:
bpf: Add oversize check before call kvcalloc()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.150 by commit 93937596e0652d50973f9dc944fea1694ac8cdfd. For more details please see the references link.
